title: S2 Ep48: How the mobile internet changed politics
itunes:title: How the mobile internet changed politics
description: The mobile internet, promises to give us access to information anywhere, 24 hours a day. So how has it influenced trust in governments, politics, and politicians? Sergei Guriev tells Tim Phillips about how, all over the world, 3G has reduced trust in government and aided the rise of populism.Â
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
